extendedInfo.description: This application will ONLY function for approved ClearMechanic dealers and repair shops. ClearMechanic allows dealers and repair shops to "visually explain" repairs with real-time photos, videos and expert diagrams. Car owners are more likely to trust and approve service recommendations when visual evidence is provided. We have been featured in the Wall Street Journal, Automotive News and Consumer Reports.Vehicle photos and videos taken with this application are instantly posted online for review by you and your customers. Relevant expert diagrams are automatically featured alongside the images.  We can also e-mail and text message the images and videos directly to your customers. We have documented a 20-40% increase in success rates on service recommendations when ClearMechanic  is used.Why has ClearMechanic become the most popular mobile application for automotive service centers? IT REALLY INCREASES SALES Less than half of repair recommendations are approved nationally because customers do not fully understand or trust the auto repair industry. Â Showing real-time photos and videos is the best way to close sales. Â  IT SPEEDS UP CUSTOMER APPROVALS Customers can take hours or more to approve repair jobs. Â Offering instant visual proof convinces skeptical consumers and slow-moving insurance companies. ITâS EASY TO USE Taking photos is easy. Â But, instantly sharing them with customers by web, e-mail and text message is hard. Â We have changed all that. We have spent years refining our technology to create an easy, automated and repeatable process. IT IS A HIGHLY PROFESSIONAL INTERFACE We feature your vehicle photos and video clips in a professional interface that âwowsâ customers. Â We place our world-class expert diagrams next to each vehicle image to give context and credibility. YOU TAKE THE PHOTO OR VIDEO. Â WE DO EVERYTHING ELSE! We instantly share the image by web, e-mail and text message. Â Our analysts monitor every photo and video to ensure proper resolution and quality. Â We store all images permanently, so you can search for them 2 days later or 2 months later. Â We integrate with major dealer and shop management systems to enable automated advanced features. Seeing is believing. Â Start visual selling today! Â

reviews.title: Ease of use is critical
reviews.comment: The app has been built to br incredibly easy to use for all service personnel. As other reviewers have noted, instantly sending inspection photos and videos is essential to building trust with customers. The auto repair industry sadly lacks credibility, making programs like this essential.
reviews.author: Brad Simmons

reviews.title: Trust builder
reviews.comment: Why wouldn\'t didn\'t I have this tool sooner is what I asked myself before I got it.  It is stupid proof for customers and black and white for them. EASY to sell the truth
reviews.author: Anthony Oxtal

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Use this all the time at work. The only issue I have is that the developer doesn\'t explain the reasons for the updates. Maybe I\'ve got OCD but I like to know what is being changed in an app before I install it.
reviews.author: Rafe Langston

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Great app. Force closes every time I use video. HTC one x.
reviews.author: John Branch

reviews.comment: Sucks force close every time on the HTC evo
reviews.author: A Google User
